content:
Name Crit Effect Type
Vibration If you're using a bludgeoning weapon, you drop that weapon and become enfeebled 2 until healed. Melee
Recoil You are pushed 5 feet backwards and fall prone. Ranged
Punctured Foot You take 1d4 persistent bleed damage. Until this effect ends, you take a -10-foot circumstance penalty to your land Speed. Unarmed
Mental Backlash Until healed, you are stupefied 3. Spell
name: Critical Fumble Deck #7
